00016 #include "propertydialog.h"
00017 #include "modulemanager.h"

00019 namespace SilentEye {
00020 
00021     PropertyDialog::PropertyDialog(QWidget* parent)
00022         : QDialog(parent)
00023     {
00024         setupUi(this);
00025         m_img = NULL;
00026     }
00027 
00028     void PropertyDialog::setImage(Image* img)
00029     {
00030         m_img = img;
00031 
00032         pathLabel->setText(m_img->filePath());
00033 
00034         dimensionLabel->setText( QString::number(m_img->width())
00035                                  + "x"
00036                                  + QString::number(m_img->height()) );
00037 
00038         Image* image = NULL;
00039         QString capacityText = "";
00040         foreach(ModuleInterface* module,
00041                 ModuleManager::get(ModuleManager::IMAGEFORMAT))
00042         {
00043 
00044             image = ((FormatModuleInterface*)module)->encodeImage(m_img, true);
00045             long capacity = image->capacity();
00046             capacityText += "====== "+module->typeSupported()+" ======\n"+
00047                 QString::number(capacity)+" octects\n"+
00048                 QString::number(capacity/1024.0)+ " ko\n\n";
00049             delete image;
00050         }
00051 
00052         if(!capacityText.isEmpty())
00053             capacityLabel->setText(capacityText);
00054     }
00055 
00056 }
